title: Taco vs Burrito - The Wildly Popular Surprisingly Strategic Card Game Created by a 7 Year Old - 5 Ways to Play - a Family-Friendly Party Game for Kids, Teens & Adults
features: Quick to Learn, Exciting to Play: Easy to learn with quick gameplay and unexpected Action Cards. Games last 15 minutes. Learn in 3 minutes and compete to create the wildest meal for victory!
Created by a 7-year-old: Taco vs Burrito started when Alex (age 7) proclaimed that he wanted to create a game.

Ideal Gift for Every Occasion: Whether it's a Birthday, Christmas, Graduation, Hanukkah, Thanksgiving, Halloween, or any special gathering, this game is a fantastic gift for anyone who loves board games or card games
Complete Set for Epic Fun: Taco vs Burrito core game has 56 cards (ingredients and actions), 4 taco/burrito meal holders, 3 quick start cards, and a rule book. For 2-4 players, ages 6 to 106+.

Family Bonding Time Redefined: Bring everyone together with this captivating game. Whether it's a cozy family night, a playdate for kids, or a friendly competition among siblings, Taco vs Burrito is sure to create memorable moments.
